name: Avient Corporation
description: Avient Corporation is a global provider of specialized and sustainable material solutions, focused on enhancing the performance of its customers’ products and processes. Founded in 2020 as a result of the rebranding of PolyOne Corporation, Avient offers a broad range of innovative solutions, including advanced polymer formulations, specialty additives, and colorants. With a commitment to sustainability, Avient is dedicated to developing eco-friendly products and helping its clients reduce their environmental impact. The company serves a variety of industries including packaging, consumer goods, automotive, healthcare, and electronics. Avient’s innovative approach combines cutting-edge technology with industry expertise, enabling them to deliver tailored solutions that meet specific customer needs. The company is also committed to driving circular economy initiatives, providing recycling solutions, and reducing waste through its sustainable product innovations. Avient’s mission is to empower its customers by delivering sustainable solutions that not only enhance their products but also create value for their businesses and the environment.
